H0.text: what is the name of the protease which is released in the stomach. Gastrin

H1.text: what is the name of the protease which is released in the stomach. Trypsin

H2.text: what is the name of the protease which is released in the stomach. Chymotrypsin

H3.text: what is the name of the protease which is released in the stomach. Pepsin

A4.text: Pepsin is an endopeptidase that breaks down proteins into smaller peptides and amino acids.

A5.text: The hormone gastrin and the vagus nerve trigger the release of both pepsinogen and HCl from the stomach lining when food is ingested.
